001
002package io.vrap.rmf.base.client.http;
003
004import org.slf4j.event.Level;
005
006/**
007 * Middleware instrumenting the {@link InternalLogger}
008 */
009public interface InternalLoggerMiddleware extends Middleware {
010
011    static InternalLoggerMiddleware of(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory) {
012        return new InternalLoggerMiddlewareImpl(internalLoggerFactory);
013    }
014
015    static InternalLoggerMiddleware of(final InternalLoggerFactory internalLoggerFactory, final Level responseLogEvent,
016            final Level deprecationLogEvent) {
017        return new InternalLoggerMiddlewareImpl(internalLoggerFactory, responseLogEvent, deprecationLogEvent);
018    }
019}
